com.droidcare.control

Class LoginManager

  • Object
    • LoginManager

  • public class LoginManager
extends Object
    This singleton class handles all user login and logout request.
    Author:
    Edwin Candinegara

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  LoginManager.OnFinishTaskListener
      Interface used to allow the SimpleHttpPost to run some code when it has finished executing.

      • getInstance

        public static LoginManager getInstance()
        Obtains the singleton manager.
        Returns:

      • validateForm

        public int validateForm(String email,
               String password)
        Validates login form which contains email and password.
        Parameters:
        email - Email.
        password - Password.
        Returns:
        Returns the validation status in integer (either EMAIL_EMPTY, PASSWORD_EMPTY, PASSWORD_MINIMUM_LENGTH, PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT, or VALID_FORM

      • doLoginRequest

        public void doLoginRequest(String email,
                  String password,
                  LoginManager.OnFinishTaskListener onFinishTaskListener)
        Send a login request to the server and process the response from the server.
        Parameters:
        email - User's email.
        password - User's password.
        onFinishTaskListener - Interface.
